itemizedlist.listitem:
FreeBSD 4.X-STABLE continues incremental feature, performance, stability development.
FreeBSD 4.9 (October, 2003) FreeBSD 4.10 (May, 2004)

FreeBSD 5.X-CURRENT continues higher risk development, approaches -STABLE.
FreeBSD 5.0 (January, 2003) FreeBSD 5.1 (June, 2003) FreeBSD 5.2 (January, 2004) FreeBSD 5.2.1 (February, 2004)
